sentence.Network_cn: 她的声音越来越微弱了。

sentence.Network_en: Economic planners fumbled ineffectually with agricultural and industrial programs.
sentence.Network_cn: 经济计划制订人徒劳无益地在摸索农业和工业规划.

sentence.Network_en: Her love was a fire playing ineffectually over a rock of basalt.
sentence.Network_cn: 她的爱,如同一团火,徒劳地烧炼着一块玄武岩石.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(I) ... ineffectual 无效的 ineffectually 无效地 inefficacious 无效力的.
Economic planners fumbled ineffectually with agricultural and industrial programs ., 经济计划制订人徒劳无益地在摸索农业和工业规划.

list.abs: 无效... ... 9. The treaty has been declared void. 条约被宣布无效. 10. All rescue measures proved ineffectual. 抢救无效.
不知疲惫 ... 89. prolonged vt. 延长, 拖延 90. ineffectual adj. 无效的, 不成功的 91. hospice n. 旅客住宿处, 收容所.

RelatedPhrase.word: leadership rendered ineffectual by recalcitrant subordinates

list.key: leadership rendered ineffectual by recalcitrant subordinates
list.abs: 头什么尾什么... ... ◎ 尾部[ tail;caudal region] ◎ 尾大不掉[ leadership rendered ineffectual by recalcitrant subordinates].
...台湾经济颓势，从一个万人景仰的政治明星，成为一个“无能的笨蛋(ineffectual bumbler)”。
台湾《醒报》称， 这篇文章的标题用“Ma the bumbler”（笨拙的马英九），内文用“没用的笨蛋”（ineffectual bumbler）。文中写的、 …

entry.tran: 不起作用的;徒劳无益的
entry.def: If someone or something is ineffectual, they fail to do what they are expected to do or are trying to do.

example.ex: The mayor had become ineffectual in the struggle to clamp down on drugs.
example.tran: 市长打击毒品的努力未见成效。

example.ex: ...the well-meaning but ineffectual jobs programs of the past.
example.tran: 过去的一些出发点很好但却无成效的就业计划

sentences.sentence: "she tried ineffectually to light the primus, and Thomas came to help her"
